casebody.data:
No. 09-7433. Gregory A. Garton, Petitioner v. United States. 562 U.S. 1078, 131 S. Ct. 633, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 9299.

178 L. Ed. 2d 508,

November 29, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.

Same case below, 336 Fed. Appx. 804.
